name: My pico adventure
description:
Description:

This is my third and last game on pico-8, maybe I'll do another game on this fantasy console in the future but not now.

This is an adventure game with similar mechanics to the first zelda.

Objective:

You start as a heroic rooster going after the big bad fox named baboosh kidnapped princess chicken for his dinner, you have to find the keys hidden around the map to arm yourself and confront baboosh the fox to free the princess from her restraints.

Controls:

← →  ↑ ↓ to move

X to interact and use the Barbequeue Wand

C to use the Barbequeue Sword

E to access your inventory
